DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate photostress recovery blue light filter clip-on glass among pseudophakes [ ie , subject natural lens eye replace artificial lens ( intraocular lens ) cataract surgery ] . This study enroll subject previously implant blue light filter intraocular lens ( IOLs ) least 3 month .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Blue Light Filtration Visual Performance
DOC.criteria: Cataract surgery eye blue light filter intraocular lens least 3 month ; Good ocular health ; 20/40 good vision best correction eye ; Willing provide voluntary consent sign inform consent form ; Able competently perform test ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Ocular pathology , degeneration , medium opacity ( cloudiness ) could impact study measurement ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
